com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Interface INodeService

All Superinterfaces:
IService
All Known Implementing Classes:
NodeService
public interface INodeService
extends IService

The interface for the NodeService class The node service class provides remote services to manipuate node objects.

Method Detail

createNode

NodeSummary createNode(PCSession session,
                       java.lang.String sNodeID,
                       int nType,
                       java.lang.String sXNodeType,
                       java.lang.String sOriginalID,
                       int nPermission,
                       int nState,
                       java.lang.String sAuthor,
                       java.lang.String sLabel,
                       java.lang.String sDetail,
                       java.util.Date dCreationDate,
                       java.util.Date dModificationDate)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
Adds a new node to the database and returns it if successful

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the session object for the database to use.
String - sNodeID, the id of the node being created.
int - nType, the integer type of the node being created.
String - sXNodeType, the extended node type of the node being created.
sOriginalID, - the original ID if relevant else empty String.
int - nPermission, the permission level of the node being created.
int - nState, the inital state of the node being created
String - sAuthor, the author of this node
String - sLabel, the label of this node
String - sDetail, the primary details (page 1 of any details), for this node
Date - dCreationDate, the creation date of this node
Date - dMmodificationDate, the modification date of this node (same as creation date).
Returns:
NodeSummary, the node summary object representing the node created successfully, otherwise null.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

void setOriginalID(PCSession session,
                   java.lang.String sNodeID,
                   java.lang.String oldValue,
                   java.lang.String newValue,
                   java.util.Date dModificationDate,
                   java.lang.String sLastModAuthor)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
Sets the value for original imported Id for this node id.

Parameters:
session - the session object for the database to use.
sNodeID - the node id of node whose origianl id to set.
oldValue - the original original id of the node.
newValue - the new original id of the node.
dModificationDate - the date this node is being modified.
sLastModAuthor - the author name of the person who made this modification.
Throws:
